channel.title: Tiny thoughts from a tiny brain
channel.description:
.... If you can't kill the MM* as the king.. What's the point of the king having a killing ability?..
We have some great suggestions about the king here.. **NO KING, vote him up day 4.** (Stole that one from the post above ;) ) Yes, people could step up to become king with some actual logs. No, every royal BD would have to make a claim or show that they are royal..
**The king is the king right?** He should be informed on who the Prince is jailing.. Every night ! Passive ability.
Yes, this would support his investigative abilitys by a landslide! Someone giving the king logs about a fella that was in fact jailed.. Well oops. That fella is lying. No, .... Why not?
**King is still a king.** King can force start a trial instead of having two votes. (I would credit the fella who said it but I forgot.)
Yes, the finger isn't the strongest of abilitys and we're coming in to actual king actions here. No, Time will be wasted during trials for sharing information, but hey, we're good at starting trials early anyway!
_*MM, Scorned, Merc guarding, Merc guarded target, jailed target (you're the king), Poss, Sorc, Reaper with souls, and also healed and knight guarded targets.._
Oh, and yes, all the other stuff that was supposed to be implemented in to the game but wasn't. Please give it to us. :breast_feeding:

item.title: Tiny thoughts from a tiny brain
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
I actually quite like the idea of the King having a passive where he can see who the Prince jails. Fits thematically, gives a bit of extra power, and would appease all the whiners who are crying now that Prince has no OP investigative ability.
